message.body: What chu up to this eve?
None plans after grocery shopping! Partyyy
You wanna? My place, yr place, some other place?
Mmmm, I'm flexible. What do you feel like?
I'm all set mostly. Should we say 845?
Perfect. I'll be the guy sitting at the bar.
Cute.
(01/02) Hey Marth thanks for the lovely evening. My drunken ramblings aside, that was really nice. You're pretty sharp. I guess I shouldn't be surprised seeing
(02/02) as you are Tyler's sister ... Buenos noches
Stfu about your "imbibed" ramblings. It was lovely. Tyler will be disappointed that his stand in did ok but I'm happy to hear it. Sweet dreams and movie/matt Olson soon.
(01/02) Ha! I considered imbibed but thought better of it after reviewing my msg a few times. Got to get it just right you know. Midnight in Paris with matt a
(02/02) nd Tim? Sounds like a lovely woody Allen awkwardfest.
I mucho passed out before getting this. Sorrrrrry. Now I bet waking your 9:00 am work bound ass up.
(01/02) Martha if there is one thing in life that I value as much as our friendship, it's sleeping. You disrupted one of those and now the other is in serious j
(02/02) eopardy. 36 ounces of coffee later I can bring myself to forgive you. Happy summer solstice!
By the by, no reply from matt o...?
No reply! I guess he's moved on to bigger and better things. I always knew he was selfish
Did you hear back from Matty boy? Because I did!
Yea we're hanging out right now.
That was a joke
Hey feel free to philander with Matthew in my absence. I know how you love that guy. And since when do you make jokes?
I'm fucking hilarious, tim.
Hey but did you text him back? Does thursday work for you?
Yeah yeah you're a regular Joan rivers. I haven't texted him back but def will
Happy solstice!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I knew it felt like the longest day of the year. Where are our Wiccan friends to cast the appropriate spells?
They're all hanging with the romas casting spells on unsuspecting Spanish children
Do you have a copy of America?
I don't understand ....
You do too... The book you told me to read?
Freedom! Well I just lent it to my mom for her book club so you can have it in August. I do have his other really good one if you want that instead?
So glad I equated the two. There's an American flag onthe cover though, right? Fuck it, im brainwashed. Whats your other one?
(01/02) They are synonyms you know. No flag on the cover though. It's called the corrections and was a nyt best seller for like fifty years or something. If you
(02/02) don't read it, I'm gonna.
Well if you've been planning to you should. I'm not going to cock block your summer reading.
(01/02) Nah, no cock blockin. You should read it. Ideally you should get your hands on a copy of freedom but this would do in the interim. Or you could chk out
(02/02) the library!
Thanks levar Burton
But don't take my word for it!
(I hope you got that reading rainbow reference )
Uhhhh did you get mine?
Duhhh. That's what inspired mine
Then what do you mean 'I hope you got it'? Hah. Do you think im DUMB
(01/02) Puhlease. It was just a deep reference that only a true rr fan would get. Also, have you heard the new buddy holly tribute album? It's streaming free on
(02/02) npr and it kicks ass!
No, but I'm on it now. Thanks dood.
You on for barbette tonight?
Furr sure, you?
Fo shizzy
In bed safe and happy. Cant promise the same for the morning. But you can stop worrying now.
(01/02) I was a bit worried but glad you made it home safely. You'll be fine in the a.m. and will probably be glad to be wearing your casual clothes to work in
(02/02) stead of what I could offer. Sleep well Marth. Let's late night wine chat again sometime
Finance was not ready for me this morning. Hoo boy. New ulm?
(01/02) You're kinda a lightweight Martha. The finance world demands the ability to drink heavily. As much as I'd enjoy hanging with you in n.u. I don't think I
(02/02) 'm gonna go cuz pa is gonna be home. When you leaving town?
Too bad about daddy. I'm not sure when I'm leaving. Might just see how I feel?
(01/02) Well a wise singer once told me to listen to my heart when it's calling my name so I suggest you do that. Lemme know if you hang around and wanna paint
(02/02) the town red
Yea? What are you doing tonight?
Invited to a bday party for someone I know peripherally so not really sold on that. You? We could see the woody movie if you don't wanna party or go to new ulm
Lets do it. Early or late?
Kinda prefer late, I think I need a disco nap. Unless you prefer otherwise of course
No that's cool, I'm in the middle of my own. The late at St Anthony main is at 935
That sounds perfect . You still down?
Yessss. I'll see you there?
Don't be late, you know how I hate that
Relax, Campbell
Not my style, Stuckey. Maybe with the help of a pharmaceutical ...
Were you able to make the long journey all by your lonesome? I hope you didn't have to leave before noon...
Yea yeesh I didn't know it was 4 am when you left last night... But I made it despite the lonely ride. Did you get some good sleep?
(01/02) Semi solid sleep but I have felt strange all day and think I owe you some kind of apology. Good luck with the singing and have a blast in n-field. Let's
(02/02) get together when you get back in town
Why do you owe me an apology?
I don't know Martha! Because I feel like I'm taking advantage of your friendship. Maybe I can explain in words sometime like an adult? It ain't no thanf
I don't know how youve done it but I think you out-overthought even ME. But we'll talk.
Wait, is this about my human rights sweatshirt??
Haha! I'm really curious as to how you think this could be about your human rights shirt... And you're right, total overthinking on my part
The shirt part was a joke. But it's good to think so I don't mean to admonish you for it.
How does haberdashery come up twice in one week?
(01/02) Wellllll when you hang out with such classy gentlemen, it's bound to come up. Tell scott(y) or Tyler that if they're looking for a haberdashing companio
(02/02) n I'm their guy
Hey dude. What are you getting into today?
(01/02) Just finished a mammoth bike ride so recovering from that. Might go to the givers show if I can score a free tic otherwise just laying low. You? Back in
(02/02) town? Scheming something good?
Wellllll I'm supposed to have dinner with an old coworker but I'm looking to get out of it.
Ok so? Think I'm gonna make some din if you're interested. Can't promise it will be haute but it will be cuisine
I should probably go. I'd feel guilty. Are you going to the concert?
Nooope. Well the offer still stands if you're feeling devious. Otherwise have fun and lemme know if you wanna hang. Btw I am digging fleet foxes
Yea I might call you afterwards. Rain check on dinner though. All you've ever made me is marshmallow and peanut butter sandwiches. And fuck yes fleet foxes.
Well I've graduated to grilled pepper and garlic pasta so there! And coming from ms. Bread and jam I'm not at all offended
Hah. You win.
Should I stop holding my breath Marth?
Still dining. And drinks later. Sorry, kiddo.
Word. Summer in the city. Enjoy yr social butterflying
Yo dude. Sorry about last night. They were buying me lots of alcohol and you know me and the sauce. What are you doing tonight?
(01/02) Martha, no need to apologize. I hope you don't feel obligated to hang! Knowing me, I'll probably be doing something awesome tonight and if you're into t
(02/02) hat kind of thing then you should join
Obligated? No no. Well I'm doing aomething awesome and thought you might want to come. Open mic night?
Hell yes! I was wondering when that was happening. Are you singing with your backing band?
Martha and the Vandellas?
With Jesse yea! Jesse vandela.
Are you actually open mic-ing or are you getting drinks with old co-workers?
Hah. Well my guitarist forgot his sister is coming home from new Zealand so that might not be happening. But there is a free concert that meg told me about. Does that sound cool?
FuckMartha! I was looking forward to that. Are you going with Meg? Who's Meg? Yes.
There's one tomorrow! And many following weeks. And you know meg. Megan Hadley. Yea, I think were meeting at 8? Somewhere? Let me find out the deets.
Hmmm I dunno if I want to break up that ladies aid convention
Lame. Yea, I'm reconsidering any sort of loud music for tonight. I was a little wrecked this morning. Do you know the steamboat kings?
Don't know em but I'd be down. If you're exhausted though don't even worry about it
Alright, lets do it. It's at te fine line. Do you want to meet there or meet here?
Are you on the way there?
Oh no, we're meeting at my house at 830
Good c u then
Is danny being premiered tonight?
Think so! Right next to you too. You in?
Hmm sounds interesting . I might consider thinking about it ...
Are you sure you don't want to consider considering thinking about it?
I guess I should weigh that option too, you're right.
When and where?
I'm not sure when we play exactly but after or around 10 at moto i
Oho! You roll late night. Maybe I'll take a disco nap
I'm going to have to also. I exhausteddd
Ok so Jesse just told me he's done with work at 12 so I don't know if well sing danny. I'll probably still go with meg though
Social butterflying takes its toll on even the heartiest party animals like yourself. Take a night off one of these days. Stay in and hang with rachel
Oh fuuuuckin a Marth.
You always make me feel so guilty Campbell
Sorry. It's just that you're always leaving me wanting more, what with your changes of plans. But such is the life of a socialite
Hardly a socialite...
Do you have camping stuff?
Yes ma'am. Planning a trip? It's all yours
Mmmm change of plans. Meg and I are ditching open mic for cheap seat bootleggers downtown. You should come, Swass!
We're heading out right now
Wellll cool I don't think I can join you guys though
Tim...
Ok. I understand. You don't like Megan
I love Megan! I just can't keep bustin up yr partie.
Did you get tix?
Yea and hot dogs and grain belt.
Fuck you're making me jelly
I'm inviting you to my party so you're not busting it up
Hey do you know Andrew mueller?
Ummm I know the name. Macalester dude? Why?
Macalester dude that Megan is dating.
He was a music and Spanish major. He plays violin
Oh shit! Yeah I know who he is. Definitely seemed like a sweet guy . So you guys are clearly paying attention to the game...
Scores 3 to 1 bottom f the fourth, four stolen bases, riveras up to bat
Ahhhhhhh.!!! Who's winning?
Twins.
OK I'm impressed
It's four to one now
Well now you're just showing off. Is Andrew at the game?
No he lives in Portland actually.
So sorry to keep you in suspense. Im too tired to call back but don't be anxious. I've been feeling things for you too. Lots to make sense of over a glass of wine and muscle Relaxers.
(01/02) Ha! You sure know how to charm. Sorry for the voicemail but I thought you might pick up. Sometimes you just have to say things even at the most inoppor
(02/02) tune times. Sleep deep, talk to you soon
Hey I think we might be having a potluck tonight if you want to come... might just be the housemates but if it turns out otherwise you should come.
BYO muscle relaxers, of course

Does that mean there will be other brands to try??? I'm meeting some people at chatterbox in St Paul at 8 for dinner which you could come to afterwards! Theres karaoke... But let me know when the next potluck is
Yes tonight's theme is barbiturates, unfortunately you'll miss it. We'll see about the karaoke...
The karaoke is incidental. Drinks and food too. You are you 'we'll see's
Wait so what's not incidental? I'm a busy guy Marth. Although I would love to hear you karaoke esp. with a few drinks in you
I didn't know if karaoke turned you off so I mentioned that is wasn't the sole purpose of our visit. But I won't twist your arm...
Well I'm not a huge fan but if I can get away early enough from fam dinner then I'll be there.
Ok. Enjoy!
How's the potluck?
Are you by any chance hanging with my old buddy Jack Adams? If so, give him my regards
Nope actually. Nick Sahli is. Josh Vogen. Travis and Jason and Jesse and Megan
The gang's all back! Well hope you're getting your Sasha fierce on. Or your June Carter cash
I did fleetwood Mac instead and it was too low.
Don't stop thinking about tomorrow? That's one of my faves. Shoulda known Stevie would bring you down with her
Did the heat mess up your furniture moving?
(01/02) It messed up my clothes! I have literally sweated through every garment I'm wearing. How's that for attractive. I stand corrected re my nickname. How's
I like sweating to an extent, so it's oppressing like always in my high rise. But I don't envy you with the manual labor
The five year old daughter just got home and gave me a disgusted look. Oppressive heat in your office or oppressing your soul? What you up to a noche?
Oh you haven't changed? Hah. None plans.
(01/02) Well I'm meeting my cousins from ny for a few hours so if you feel like hanging late I'd be down. OR we could hang another time. OR we could just keep s
(02/02) ending text messages all summer. Totally up to you
Yea bc I never invite you to hang out... How late?
I know, I kid. Hmm maybe like 10? I guess that's getting up there. I'll keep you posted but by all means go out if something else comes up
I might work on finances and things here tonight actually, so I'll be around. So let me know
Haha ok well have fun with finances
I'm a grownup. Actually it's for school stuff in the fall
Well that sounds legit. I, on the other hand, am about to go paddle boating. I'm a grownup too...
Wear your life jacket!
What's your status? Wanna hang?
Still financing while looking like a fiera. Translate that. Anyways I probably oughtta shower and get to bed. Don't be mad...
(01/02) I'm getting "wild beast" which sounds like fun. I'm feeling a little pegajoso myself. No worries about hangin. I probably would have been a sudoroso gr
(02/02) ump anyway. Have a cool slumber.
Ditto. :)
What are you getting into this eve sra. Fiera? I was gonna go to the cabin tonight but think I'm staying til tomorrow if you wanna hang
Yea I might go see a band later, but I don't have anything concrete yet. Have you eaten? I'm just about to make dinner
Just woke up from a weak nap haven't eaten. Mac and cheese?
That was a baby nap... No but if you have food you should bring it bc I have half a zucchini two eggs and a head of cauliflower
You running a monastery or something? I ain't got shit either. Wanna get some din? Unless you're set on cauliflower and eggs
It's all I have and the storms are scaring me away from going shopping. I shouldnt spend money on dinner, I spent 9 on parking and went out to lunch :/ I have cereal too!
OK you are loco sometimes. I have a bottle of wine and some mac and cheese...
Loco? I found pasta... We'll manage.
And that's all I can offer to this stone soup
Is that an invite?
Don't forget the moral of te story
Yea come over! Loco...
I might need an opener?
Balls. Ok turning around
I found one and forgot to tell you don't turn around!
Shit Martha I wish you wouldn't jerk me around. I love hangin but man you drive me crazy sometimes
Home safe and sound.

I really don't mean to jerk you around tim. I wanted to talk last night and the nights before but it didn't work out or it didn't come up. I'm sorry if it seems otherwise and that I made you feel slighted.
Well I feel sick thinking about this. Is there anything I can do!
That was supposed to be a question mark...
(01/02) Haha! Wow I didn't mean to sound do dramatic in that text. That was stupid. Are you sure you're not just sick because you're hungover? Can I swing by on
(02/02) my way out of town?
Well i don't want to cause you distress either way. When are you leaving?
Probs 11. No worries at all if you're not up for it though
I told my friend dan I would meet up with him at 10 for brunch and sone singing. Rain check?
Fo sho. Have fun with musical brunch and enjoy this beautiful day
The bohemian b&b burnt down last night... Scary stuff
No way! That's so sad. I always wanted to stay there. Did it burn to the ground?
The picture my mom sent from the journal makes it look pretty bad. Four people are 'missing'
Holy shit I just talked to my dad, the family that owned it are members of the church. He was there all night and they think everyone died
Oof. Is it Bobby and her kids?
Yeah, so crazy. Life is a fragile beast
(01/02) Hey that was totally unfair of me to say that last night. I was drunk and tired and you've been nothing but lovely. Believe me that I'm actually not an
(02/02) anxious downer?
I believe you. Don't worry. It's not an uncomplicated situation so I think we're doing the best we can. Thanks for saying why you did though.
How are your parents?
(01/02) I think they're pretty upset by the whole fire thing. My dad's not able to come up now which he's really bummed about. At least it's beautiful up here t
(02/02) oday. You having a rollicking weekend?
It's pretty good... You know you know. You should come back for the fireworks and the 10 second film festival... It's at the soap factory
I think I'm gonna be back around 8 or so and I'd love to. I went a few years ago and it was great. I'll be sure to bring all my john Philip souza records
Cool. :) Scott, his boyfriend, meg, and Tyler might come too. Can't back out now!
